meanings.definition: Relating to or having the properties of a unit.
meanings.sent1: The unital block fit perfectly into the structure.
meanings.sent2: The team worked together in a unital effort to achieve their goal.
meanings.sent3: The unital puzzle pieces clicked together smoothly.
meanings.sent4: Her unital approach to problem-solving brought harmony to the team.
meanings.sent5: The unital bond between the siblings was unbreakable.

meanings.definition: Involving or characterized by unity or oneness.
meanings.sent1: The unital choir sang in perfect harmony.
meanings.sent2: The community came together in a unital celebration.
meanings.sent3: The unital colors of the painting blended seamlessly.
meanings.sent4: Their unital vision for the project inspired everyone.
meanings.sent5: The unital spirit of the team propelled them to success.
